Title: Prisoner of the Judoon (1)
Plot: Sarah Jane and the gang face the most dangerous day of their lives, as the rhino-like Judoon return. When prisoner Androvax the Destroyer crash-lands on Earth, a Veil is set free and starts to turn Earth's technology against itself.
GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Nicholas Briggs, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Terence Maynard, Robert Curtis, Mark Goldthorp, Scarlett Murphy
